./.title: OasisMetaverse Introduction
./.body: OASIS Metaverse   OASISMetaverse is the world's first Decentralized multi-product integrated platform based on BSC ,Oasis metaverse includes oasis swap, oasis yield Farming, oasis NFTs, oasis gamefi and other branch products. You can trade, earn, win crypto and take away the limited edition NFTs on the most popular decentralized platform. Spend a little OST tokens to mint your NFTs, synthesize new NFTs, collect or sell them to earn OST and BNB. Try OasisMetaverse's multiple yield farming, take your OST and NFT airdrop rewards.More details of the NFT airdrop event are being planned. OASISMetaverse is a magical decentralized trading platform!

products/.title: PRODUCTS
products/.body: PRODUCTS   BinanceSmartChain's First Metaverse = Oasis Metaverse Oasis Metaverse = Swap + Farming + NFTs + GameFi   Enjoy OasisMetaverse!

products/OASISwap.html.title: OASISwap
products/OASISwap.html.body: OasisMetaverse Introduction   What is OasisMetaverse? OasisMetaverse is the world's first Decentralized multi-product integrated platform deployed on BinanceSmartChain. OasisMetaverse includes oasis swap, oasis yield Farming, oasis NFTs, oasis gamefi and other branch products. Oasiswap is based on the proven Money Pool Automatic Market Making Algorithm (AMM) and implements various mining mechanisms such as digital currency exchange, as well as liquidity mining and transaction mining. Official website: https://oasiswap.finance​ In addition, OasisMetaverse has established strategic partnerships with many projects in the BSC ecosystem. You can trade, earn, win crypto and take away the limited edition NFTs on the most popular decentralized platform. Try OasisMetaverse's multiple yield farming, take your OST and NFT airdrop rewards.More details of the NFTs airdrop event are being planned.   OasisMetaverse is designed to meet different financial needs, based on cutting-edge blockchain technology, connecting the entire blockchain world via web 3.0. For more information on how to use the individual products of OasisMetaverse, please refer to the official guide.

products/OASISwap/how-to-swap.html.title: How to Swap
products/OASISwap/how-to-swap.html.body: How to swap   Start Swap Now. Go to the OASISwap page. Clike Here: https://app.oasiswap.finance   Copy Oasiswap Hosted list link: https://token.oasiswap.finance/oasiswap-hosted-list.json Hosted list Can help you avoid being deceived by the token of malicious contract code! Then paste to "Add list"       Find the two tokens you want to trade (you can also search for the pass name or paste the pass contract address to find it).   Enter the number of transactions and click on Swap.   In the MetaMask pop-up window, click Confirm.   Wait for the transaction to complete and the token is redeemed successfully.

products/OASISwap/how-to-add-and-remove-.title: How to Add/Removeliquidity
products/OASISwap/how-to-add-and-remove-.body: How to Add/Remove Liquidity   Add Liquidity Go to the Pool page and click Add Liquidity.    Enter the two passes you want to add liquidity to, enter the corresponding quantity, and click Add.   Click Confirm Supply.   Click Confirm in the MetaMask Wallet window.   Wait for the liquidity to be added after the delivery contract interaction.   Remove Liquidity Click Manage to the right of the mobility you want to remove and expand the details.   Click Remove.   Enter the number to be removed and click Approve & Remove.   Click Confirm in the MetaMask Wallet window.   Wait for the contract to interact before liquidity removal is complete.   Congratulations! Anyone that provide Liquidity for OST/USDT or OST/BNB will receive some OST token Airdrop&Rewards!

products/Farming.html.title: Oasis Farming
products/Farming.html.body: Oasis Farming   Liquidity, Trade, Loan mining Yield Farming is one of the latest trends that has rapidly forced its way into the decentralized finance (DeFi) world, Oasiswap Farming provide new multiple strategies and techniques aimed at providing users with more opportunities to generate larger incomes. On the basis of liquidity mining and trade mining, Oasiswap Farming has added various mining methods such as NFT mining and loan mining. More product details are still under development. Swap any tokens on OASISwap, you will have a chance to get OST token airdrop rewards.Add any token liquidity pool on BSC, get OST token liquidity mining rewards, and limited edition NFT airdrops, etc. Join any LP token pledge mining, get OST mining rewards, OST airdrop rewards and NFTs airdrop rewards, etc.

products/Farming/Liquidity.html.title: Liquidity
products/Farming/Liquidity.html.body: Liquidity   Go to the Add Liquidity page, link https://app.oasiswap.finance/#/pool Click on the Add Liquidity button.   Select OST/BNB or OST/USDT or OST/XXX(other token), enter the amount you want to add, for example 10 USDT, the system will automatically calculate the amount of BNB/USDT needed, click Add. ( Now the income of creating/adding an OST trading pair is the highest. Your income includes OST official rewards, OST official airdrops, and mining rewards. )   In the Metamask window that pops up, click Confirm button.   Click Confirm Supply.   After you added, you will see OST/XXX LP Tokens, your position will be showed at the bottom of the page.   Now you can get rewards after the official airdrop is completed. If you want to know how to get more income, please click to visit：https://docs.oasiswap.finance/activity/

products/OasisNFTs.html.title: OasisNFTs
products/OasisNFTs.html.body: OasisNFTs   Mint, Synthesize, Sell NFTs, Blind Box   Focusing on NFT metaverse and GameFi, OasisMetaverse will be committed to building the latest blockchain games and NFT financial system for a long time in the future, making NFT not only interesting and fun, but also collectable and make money for you, etc. Minting your own NFT, only a small amount of OST/BNB is required, but it gives you the opportunity to earn a large amount of OST/BNB. Spend a small amount of OST/BNB to make some Oasis NFTs blind boxes, and you will win 100%, but the rarity of NFTs obtained in NFTs blind boxes is different. The high-value limited edition NFT airdrop is a gift we give to those who contribute to the provide liquidity of the OASIS metaverse. More details are under development. Enjoy!

wallettutorial/.title: WALLETTUTORIAL
wallettutorial/.body: WALLET TUTORIAL   You can find a detailed tutorial on how to access OASISwap in each wallet here. So let’s get started!

wallettutorial/MetaMask.html.title: MetaMask
wallettutorial/MetaMask.html.body: MetaMask   1. Install MetaMask Wallet From Chrome. MetaMask website: https://metamask.io​   In Chrome, for example, download and install the MetaMask Wallet plugin in the Chrome online app store. Download address: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/metamask/nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknn​   Once installed, open MetaMask. By default, the wallet is connected to the Ethereum Mainnet, click on the Ethereum Mainnet, and in the drop-down menu, click on Custom RPC: Fill in the BSC Mainnet RPC data in the form:   Mainnet RPC   Networt Name: BSC Mainnet New RPC URL: https://bsc-dataseed1.binance.org/​ Chain ID: 56 Currency Symbol: BNB Block Explorer URL: https://bscscan.com/​   Once the configuration is complete and saved, switch to that network. 2. Use Oasiswap Take Swap for example, open the Oasiswap official website: https://app.oasiswap.finance.   Click Connect to a wallet in the upper right corner and select MetaMask.   Once connected, you can use Oasiswap.

wallettutorial/TokenPocket.html.title: TokenPocket
wallettutorial/TokenPocket.html.body: TokenPocket   1. Download TP wallet Visit TokenPocket wallet official website to download https://www.tokenpocket.pro.   Install and then open TP wallet. 2. Connect Wallet If you already have a TP wallet, you can choose to import wallet, select Binance Smart Chain.   You could also choose private key import，mnemonic words or keystore three ways. ​ If you don’t have a TP wallet, you could choose to create one, select Binance Smart Chain.   Set up the name of your wallet, code etc., and please be sure to keep your mnemonic words safe.   Go to the main wallet page and switch to Binance Smart Chain wallet.   3. Use KSwap Open your TP wallet, click Discover page. Click Search box.   Input KSwap website: https://app.oasiswap.finance and go to it, then you can use KSwap.

wallettutorial/Bitkeep.html.title: Bitkeep
wallettutorial/Bitkeep.html.body: Bitkeep   1. Download BitKeep Wallet Visit BitKeep wallet official website and download App. (Address:https://bitkeep.org)   Open the bitkeep wallet after installation. 2. Connect Wallet You can select to create wallet or import existed wallet. Take ‘New Wallet’ as an example. Select New Wallet，choose the right chain, check BSC, click Next step.   Back up mnemonics and verify mnemonics as required.   After verification, the wallet is created successfully.   3. Start the Journey with Oasiswap On the DApp page, click the search box at the top of the page and enter the KSwap : https://app.oasiswap.finance and search.   Select Binance Smart Chain.   When you open it for the first time, a risk statement will pop up. After reading it, select Confirm and you can start with Oasiswap.

allocation/High-Value-NFTs-Allocation.ht.body: High-Value NFTs Allocation   High-Value NFTs Details:   Subject NFT amount Ratio High-Value NFTs Allocation Details Total Mint Amount 1,000 100% - OasisMetaverse Team 100 10% Liner unlock daily in 1 years after Mint. All NFT Market 50 5% 5% will be unlocked at launch for marketing. Remaining will be divided into 12-month smart contracts to be unlocked. Add OST Liquidity Rewards 300 30% 30% of High-Value NFTs will be rewarded to those users who provide liquidity for OST/USDT or OST/BNB. activity/.title: ACTIVITY
activity/.body: ACTIVITY   Here will release the latest activity announcements of Oasis Metaverse. You can find the latest airdrops, rewards and project development progress from here. So let’s get started!

activity/Add-Liquidity-Rewards.html.title: Add Liquidity Rewards
activity/Add-Liquidity-Rewards.html.body: Add Liquidity Rewards     OasisMetaverse (https://app.oasiswap.finance) invites you to join the OasisMetaverse ecosystem projects. You will be rewarded for completing the following tasks: (Attention: You can choose all or one of them without any restrictions. You can also choose to provide liquidity for multiple tokens to earn more ost rewards and airdrops!)   Task1 and Rewards+Airdrops: Create a token and add a liquidity pool Create a token and add a liquidity pool, and you will receive 25% of the OST reward and 25% of the OST airdrop corresponding to the total value of the liquidity pool. The higher the total value of the liquidity pool, the higher the reward for OST tokens. Snapshot time: On the 15th day of adding the flow pool, the snapshot is automatically completed by the smart contract! Claim rewards/airdrops: Smart contract automatically transfers funds to your wallet immediately！ Rewards: OST rewards: 50% OST corresponding to the total value of the liquidity pool. Tutorials: How to creat a BSC token? Click Here: Create Token How to add token liquidity? Click Here: Add Liquidity   Task2 and Rewards+Airdrops: Add Liquidity For OST/BNB or OST/USDT Add Liquidity For OST/BNB or OST/USDT, and you will receive 50% of the OST reward and 50% of the OST airdrop corresponding to the total value of the liquidity pool. The higher the total value of the liquidity pool, the higher the reward for OST tokens. Snapshot time: On the 15th day of adding the flow pool, the snapshot is automatically completed by the smart contract! Claim rewards/airdrops: Smart contract automatically transfers funds to your wallet immediately！ Rewards: OST rewards: 100% OST corresponding to the total value of the liquidity pool. Tutorials: How to add OST/BNB or OST/USDT liquidity? Click Here: Add OST Liquidity   Task3 and Rewards+Airdrops: Join OasisMetaverse Community Join OasisMetaverse telegram group (https://t.me/OasisMetaverse_All_Users) Follow OasisMetaverse twitter (https://twitter.com/Oasis_Meta_BSC)     Event Period: September 22, 2021 20:00 ~ October 6, 2021 20:00 (HKT) For more details, please see OasisMetaverse official announcement.

activity/Mint-NFTs-Rewards.html.title: Mint NFTs Rewards
activity/Mint-NFTs-Rewards.html.body: Mint NFTs Rewards     OasisMetaverse (https://app.oasiswap.finance) invites you to join the OasisMetaverse ecosystem projects. You will be rewarded for completing the following NFTs tasks: (Attention: You can choose all or one of them without any restrictions. You can also choose to provide liquidity for multiple tokens to earn more ost rewards and airdrops!)   Task1 and Rewards+Airdrops: Create a token and add a liquidity pool Create a token and add a liquidity pool, and you will receive 5 High-Value NFT reward and 5 High-Value NFT airdrop. The higher the total value of the liquidity pool, the higher the reward for High_Value NFTs. Snapshot time: On the 15th day of adding the flow pool, the snapshot is automatically completed by the smart contract! Claim rewards/airdrops: Smart contract automatically transfers funds to your wallet immediately！ Rewards: High_Value NFT rewards: 10 Tutorials: How to creat a BSC token? Click Here: Create token How to add token liquidity? Click Here: Add Liquidity   Task2 and Rewards+Airdrops: Add Liquidity For OST/BNB or OST/USDT Add Liquidity For OST/BNB or OST/USDT, and you will receive 10 High-Value NFT reward and 10 High-Value NFT airdrop. The higher the total value of the liquidity pool, the higher the reward for High_Value NFTs. Snapshot time: On the 15th day of adding the flow pool, the snapshot is automatically completed by the smart contract! Claim rewards/airdrops: Smart contract automatically transfers funds to your wallet immediately！ Rewards: High_Value NFT rewards: 20 Tutorials: How to add OST/BNB or OST/USDT liquidity? Click Here: Add OST Liquidity   Task3 and Rewards+Airdrops: Join OasisMetaverse Community Join OasisMetaverse telegram group (https://t.me/OasisMetaverse_All_Users) Follow OasisMetaverse twitter (https://twitter.com/Oasis_Meta_BSC)     Event Period: September 22, 2021 20:00 ~ October 6, 2021 20:00 (HKT) For more details, please see OasisMetaverse official announcement.
